source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_00<tab>Rammbroes wishes to proceed with the shaping of the flawless crystals.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_00<tab>ラムブルースは、超高純度クリスタルを成形する準備をしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_01<tab>Rammbroes explains that four varieties of an extremely rare abrasive known as aethersand are required to polish the flawless crystals. Take the purse given to you by the dig supervisor and deliver it to Serendipity, the master of the Goldsmiths' Guild in Ul'dah. It is Rammbroes's hope that the presence of a celebrated adventurer will prompt the goldsmiths to redouble their efforts to procure the required materials.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_01<tab>超高純度クリスタルを成形するためには、研磨剤となる「霊砂」を集めなければならない。ラムブルースから預かった「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CB01 /var>」をウルダハの彫金師ギルドにいる「セレンディピティー」に渡し、霊砂集めに協力しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving at the Goldsmiths' Guild, you encounter an old friend: Biggs. By some strange coincidence, it appears that the Roegadyn engineer is also intent on purchasing what little aethersand there is to be had. After a somewhat one-sided negotiation, he relinquishes his questionable claim on the only available batch in exchange for a role in the forthcoming expedition. The fire-aspected aethersand thus secured, inquire as to whether Biggs might know where to obtain the three remaining varieties.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_02<tab>セレンディピティーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CB01 /var>を渡したところ、同じく霊砂を集めているビッグスに出会った。交渉の末、無事に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88C901 /var>」を譲り受けた冒険者。ほかの霊砂について、彫金師ギルドにいる「ビッグス」に話を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_03<tab>Biggs reveals that his partner, Wedge, has traveled to northern Thanalan to meet with a merchant rumored to be in possession of a quantity of earth-aspected aethersand. Make for Bluefog and seek the Lalafell, who should be accompanied by a hired adventurer bodyguard.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_03<tab>ビッグスの相棒であるウェッジが、北ザナラーンで「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CA01 /var>」を追っているらしい。キャンプ・ブルーフォグへ向かい、ウェッジが雇った「熟練の冒険者」と話そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_04<tab>According to the adventurer hired to guard Wedge, she last saw her employer during a bungled attempt to retrieve some aethersand which had been stolen by bandits. Betraying scarcely a hint of shame, the bumbling bodyguard speculates that Wedge may still be trapped inside the abandoned Amajina mythril mine which the bandits call home. Make haste to the site and rescue Biggs's stricken friend before it is too late.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_04<tab>熟練の冒険者は、賊から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CA01 /var>」を奪還する最中にウェッジとはぐれたという。アマジナ霊銀山跡で「ウェッジ」を探し、救出しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_05<tab>To your great relief, Wedge bears no scars from his recent ordeal. Unfortunately, he also bears no aethersand, having dropped it whilst fleeing from his pursuers. Search the mine and retrieve the precious mineral before the bandits stumble upon it.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_05<tab>ウェッジを見つけた。彼が逃げる最中に落としてしまった「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CA01 /var>」を、アマジナ霊銀山跡の敷地内で探そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_06<tab>You have succeeded in retrieving the lost aethersand. Return to Wedge and inform him of your success.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_06<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CA01 /var>」を見つけた。ウェッジに見せよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_07<tab>Wedge is plainly overjoyed to have the aethersand back, but when he hears of your impending expedition, he decides to surrender the precious mineral to you, reasoning that your need is greater. It is time to head back to Saint Coinach's Find, and deliver the fire- and earth-aspected aethersand to Rammbroes.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_07<tab>ウェッジは「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CA01 /var>」の回収を喜んだが、冒険者の事情を聞いて譲ってくれた。モードゥナの聖コイナク財団の調査地に戻り、ラムブルースに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88C901 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CA01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_08<tab>After delivering the two samples of aethersand, you regale Cid with tales of his indefatigable employees' most recent misadventures. When thoughts subsequently turn to the two outstanding varieties of aethersand, Rammbroes declares that he has made “arrangements” to procure them. Quite what form these arrangements may take is unclear, but his expression betrays no small amount of apprehension...
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_08<tab>2種類の霊砂を渡した。ビッグスとウェッジの奮闘を聞いたシドは嬉しそうだ。ラムブルースは残りの霊砂の調達について手を打っていると言うが、なぜか浮かない顔をしている……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_09<tab>
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SEQ_09<tab>

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_00<tab>Deliver payment for the aethersand to Serendipity in the Goldsmiths' Guild in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_00<tab>彫金師ギルドのセレンディピティーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CB01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Biggs.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_01<tab>ビッグスと話す

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the experienced adventurer in Bluefog.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_02<tab>キャンプ・ブルーフォグで熟練の冒険者と話す

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_03<tab>Rescue Wedge from the abandoned Amajina mythril mine.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_03<tab>アマジナ霊銀山跡でウェッジを救助

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_04<tab>Find the earth-cradled aethersand.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_04<tab>アマジナ霊銀山跡で<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CA01 /var>を探す

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_05<tab>Return the earth-cradled aethersand to Wedge.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_05<tab>ウェッジに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88CA01 /var>を見せる

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the aethersand to Rammbroes at Saint Coinach's Find.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_06<tab>聖コイナク財団の調査地のラムブルースに霊砂を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_TODO_07<tab>

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_000<tab>If the flawless crystals you procured for us are to retain their elemental purity during the shaping process, a very specific set of abrasive substances will be required.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_000では、超高純度クリスタルの成形を……と言いたいのだが、
属性の力を失わずに加工するには、
クリスタルと同じ属性を持った、特別な研磨剤が必要でな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_001<tab>Well, I say “substances,” but one might just as well call them one substance─namely “aethersand”─which has four elementally aspected varieties. Alas, aethersand is neither common nor cheap. Indeed, it is not unusual for the abrasive to exceed the value of the precious stones it is used to polish.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_001その研磨剤となる「霊砂」はあまりに希少で、
磨かれる宝石よりも値が張る、などと言われる代物……。
4属性分そろえるのは容易ではない。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_002<tab>Given the rarity of the materials in question, the Goldsmiths' Guild in Ul'dah seemed the likeliest place to purchase the quantity we require. When I contacted the guildmaster, however, I was informed that no aethersand was currently available. Though I requested that word be sent as soon as new stock came in, I have yet to receive aught but apologies. I should mention at this point that I placed the order some time before you procured the flawless crystals...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_002我々も、かねてからウルダハの彫金師ギルドに
収集を要請しているのだが、いまだに吉報がない状況だ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_003<tab>I am well aware that acquiring aethersand is no small feat, of course, and I am not an impatient man─but I fear the more we delay our investigation, the greater the risk that the tower's secrets may fall into the hands of other...less savory parties.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_003そこで君は彫金師ギルドに向かい、
「霊砂」の調達のために力を貸してやってほしい。
君の協力は、心強い追い風となるだろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_004<tab>That is why I wish to entrust you with the payment for our purchase, and send you to speak directly with Guildmaster Serendipity. Mayhap the presence of such a distinguished personage will spur the guild into action. In any event, it is my hope that when next we meet, you will have found at least <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> of the four varieties of aethersand we require!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_004この「」を君に託す。
ギルドマスターの「セレンディピティー」に渡し、
1種類でも多くの「霊砂」を集めてきてくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SERENDIPITY_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! Welcome, welcome! What brings you here, if I may ask?
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SERENDIPITY_000_010<tab>はい、私に何かご用でしょうか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SERENDIPITY_000_011<tab>You're here on behalf of the Sons of Saint Coinach? What fortunate timing─I was just about to contact Master Rammbroes with the news that we've finally managed to acquire a quantity of fire-aspected aethersand.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SERENDIPITY_000_011ああ、「霊砂」の件ですねっ！
ちょうどよかった、やっと「」が見つかったので
ご連絡をさしあげようと思っていたんです。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SERENDIPITY_000_012<tab>I'm afraid it may be some time before we can supply the other three varieties, but you are welcome to settle accounts for that which we have now. Pray speak with Jemime over th─
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SERENDIPITY_000_012残念ながら、ほかの属性の「霊砂」はありませんが……。
入荷した「」は受付で預かっていますので、
代金はそちらへお願いします。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SERENDIPITY_100_012<tab>Ah. I do beg your pardon. It seems she's assisting another customer.
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_SERENDIPITY_100_012<tab>……あれっ、お客さんかな？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_013<tab>Come on, there must be <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var> you can do! Without that sand, we'll have to rethink our whole design!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_013頼む、どうか譲ってくれ！
その「」が手に入らなかったら、
新型飛空艇は設計からやり直しになっちまう！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_JEMIME_000_014<tab>I sympathize with your plight, sir, but as I explained the aethersand in question is already spoken for. If you'd like to reserve the next shipment, then I would be happy to accept the funds you've offered as partial payment...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_JEMIME_000_014そう言われましても、先約がありますので。
割り増しで買ってくださるなら、考えなくもないですが？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_015<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Partial<var 1A 01 /var>!? Are you saying it's not enough!? I'm already stretching our research budget as it is! <sigh> ...I suppose a man can do without a midday meal for a year or two...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_015くっ、さっきの額でも足りないと！？
どうする……もう開発の経費で下りないぞ……。
また当面メシ抜きか……！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_016<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's been too long! What brings you here, then? Got your eye on something expensive, have you?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_016)) (( )) 03 /var>！
お前、なんだってこんなところに！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_JEMIME_000_017<tab>Well, now...that is quite a money pouch. The sound of so many gil clinking together is strangely satisfying, is it not? Calming...and yet invigorating at the same time...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_JEMIME_000_017あら、ずいぶん重たそうな金袋……。
景気のいいギルの音がしましたわ♪

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_018<tab>Oh no... You're here for the blooming <var 1A 02 /var>aethersand<var 1A 01 /var>, aren't you?
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_018<tab>……もしかして、お前も「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E88C901 /var>」を狙ってるのか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_019<tab>Well, I can't deny the Allagan civilization's a subject worth researching. The chief said he was looking into something big, but we never thought to ask him what.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_019ほう、古代アラグ文明の調査か……。
親方とは少し前から別行動をとってるもんで、
そんなことをしてるとは知らなかったぜ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_020<tab>Wedge and I have been too busy tinkering with a new airship design to think of much else, see. Well, I say “tinkering”...<var 1A 02 /var>wrestling<var 1A 01 /var> would be more like it. Still, after much wringing of hands and gnashing of teeth, we've managed to put together a prototype crystal-powered propulsion system.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_020俺とウェッジは、新しい飛空艇の開発に挑んでるんだ。
失敗もしたが、クリスタルを使った新型動力機関の作成まで
ようやく漕ぎつけてな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_021<tab>We got the idea for it when we heard how you lot had used a corrupted crystal on board the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>, as a matter of fact. Anyway, to cut a long story short, our design calls for all four varieties of aethersand.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_021以前、お前たちが偏属性クリスタルを用いて
エンタープライズを強化したと聞いて、思いついた品さ。
あとは各属性の「霊砂」で部品を整えれば完成する……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_022<tab>And that's why I can't just relinquish my claim on this batch here─even for you, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. How're we meant to usher in a brave new age of technological innovation if not by technologically innovating, eh!?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_022だから「」は譲れない。
新しい時代のために、新しい技術を生み出したいんだ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_JEMIME_000_023<tab>Ahem. While I hesitate to interrupt such an <var 1A 02 /var>impassioned<var 1A 01 /var> speech, duty compels me to point out that this <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((gentleman)) /var> is a representative of the organization that reserved the aethersand in question─to mention nothing of the fact that <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> purse is <var 1A 02 /var>considerably<var 1A 01 /var> larger than yours.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_JEMIME_000_023コホン、意気込んでいるところに失礼ですが……。
こちらの金袋は、先約した聖コイナク財団のものですわ。
……技師さんのお財布よりも重たいですし。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_024<tab>...Oh, it's like that, is it? <sigh>
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_024<tab>…………さすが、お前と親方はぬかりないな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_025<tab>All right, all right...this batch is yours. I'll let you have it. But if you're going to take my sand, it's only fair that you grant me a role in this project of yours.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_025わかった……この「」からは手を引こう。
代わりといっちゃなんだが、
お前たちの新しい計画ってやつに、俺も参加させてくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_026<tab>I'll take that as a yes. Ahhh, it's not every day you get a chance to experiment with the wonders of the ancients. With any luck, they'll inspire me to think up another technological innovation or two!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_026古代アラグ文明を調べられる機会なんて、そうないからな。
せっかく掘り起こした技術を、
親方だけの秘密にはしておけないぜ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_030<tab>Now then, from what you've told me, I'm guessing you'll be needing the other three varieties of elementally aspected aethersand as well, right?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_030さっきの話によると、お前はほかの属性の「霊砂」も
集めなきゃならないんだろ？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_031<tab>Then rather than sitting on your rump waiting for a shipment that may never come, I reckon your time would be better spent looking for the stuff yourself. And it just so happens that I know of a good place to start...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_031だったら、あてのない入荷を待つよりも、
自分の足で探した方が早いかもしれないぞ。
……実は、ちょっとした手がかりがあるんだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_032<tab>There is said to be a peddler in northern Thanalan who─very occasionally─handles the earth-aspected variety of aethersand. Wedge is in the process of confirming the rumor as we speak.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_032なんでも、北ザナラーンにいる商人が、
まれに「」を卸しているらしい。
詳しい情報は、ウェッジが調べてるところだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_033<tab>I know what you're thinking: when did my timid little friend decide he didn't need me to hold his hand anymore? The answer being: just the other day! Seems he's been inspired by a certain adventurer's heroic example. I thought he was joking when he volunteered to go to Thanalan without me. I just hope he manages to stay out of trouble...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_033あいつも、お前に触発されたらしくてな。
珍しく「ひとりでやるッス！」なんて張り切ってたんだ。
……まあ、上手くいってればいいんだが。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_034<tab>Head out to Bluefog and you should find him poking about with his new bodyguard. Oh, did I not mention her? Aye, Wedge thought it might be wise to hire an adventurer to accompany him─just in case your heroic example turned out to be less inspiring than he first thought. Heh heh!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_034ウェッジは「キャンプ・ブルーフォグ」にいる。
雇った冒険者が同行しているはずだから、
現地で探して合流してくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_035<tab>If you mean to go looking for the aethersand yourself, you'd best catch up with Wedge over in Bluefog. As for me, I plan to set out for Mor Dhona, just as soon as I've finished locking up the workshop.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_BIGGS_000_035ウェッジと一緒に「」を探すといい。
キャンプ・ブルーフォグに行けば足跡を追えるはずだ。
俺も工房を片したらモードゥナへ行くさ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_040<tab>Save your greetings. If you're looking for a hired blade, then you'll have to look elsewhere. After the day I've had, the only company I crave is the squat, silent type─the type that has a handle and holds no less than a pint of ale.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_040なによ……同行者を探してるなら、ほかをあたってくれる？
こっちは酷い目にあって、ボロボロなの。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_041<tab>...Hm? You wish to hear my tale? I warn you, 'tis no stirring epic─but as you asked... My employer─a Lalafellin lad─wished to pay a visit to a peddler who deals in some manner of special sand. I forget what it was called but 'tis apparently worth a small fortune. Anyway, when we arrived, the man claimed his stock had been stolen by bandits.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_041ララフェル族の技師に雇われて、
「霊砂」とかいう品を扱う商人を訪ねたんだけど……
意外に高価なものらしくて、賊に奪われたっていうのよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_042<tab>Determined not to return empty-handed, we crept into the bandits' stronghold and set about locating the stolen goods. Long story short, alarums were raised, rogues were awoken, and we fled in a blind panic. I was separated from my employer in the confusion and I've not seen him since. Hm? Oh. A friend of yours, is he?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_042取り戻すために根城へ忍び込んだけど、バレちゃってね。
同行してた依頼人とも、逃げるときにはぐれちゃった……
って、アナタ依頼人の知り合いなの？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_043<tab>Then you'd best be prepared for the worst. 'Tis just possible the poor sod may yet be lost in the old Amajina mythril mine...but I fear the bandits will have caught up with him by now.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_043だ、だったらアナタが探しに行ってあげなさいよ！
依頼人はまだ、賊の根城……
「アマジナ霊銀山跡」の中かもしれないわ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_044<tab>If he's still alive, your Lalafellin friend will probably be hiding somewhere inside the abandoned Amajina mythril mine where the bandits make their lair. You'll not catch me going anywhere near the place, though─I barely escaped with my life as it was!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_NPC_000_044依頼人はまだ、賊の根城……
「アマジナ霊銀山跡」の中かもしれないわ。
私は行かないわよ、ボロボロなんだもの！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_050<tab>How could I be so <var 1A 02 /var>stupid<var 1A 01 /var>? Sneaking into a bandit's lair... It's...it's just...not the sort of thing I do! And now I'm going to <var 1A 02 /var>die<var 1A 01 /var> for it!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_050ううっ、またこの展開ッス……！
雇った冒険者ともはぐれたし、今度こそ死んじゃうッス！
誰かぁ……助けてほしいッスー！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_051<tab>No. No, I-I just need to calm down. I can do this. I <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> be brave. I'm going to stand up, and I'm going to walk out of here. Here we go!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_051……いや、あと少し頑張って逃げるだけッス。
オイラだって、みんなに追いつくって決めたッス。
だから………………………………よしッ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_052<tab>YEEEAAARGH! I'm-sorry-I'm-sorry-I'm-sorry! <var 1A 02 /var>Please<var 1A 01 /var> don't kill me! I promise I'll leave and never come...back?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_052ぴぎゃああああああッ！？
ごめんなさいッス、もう来ないから許してほしい……ッス？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_053<tab><var 1A 02 /var><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1A 01 /var>!? Is it really you!? B-But how did you find me? Can you...<var 1A 02 /var>smell fear<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_053)) (( )) 03 /var>！
ど、どうしてここにいるッス！？
幻ッス？　仲間の危機を感知するセンサー搭載ッス！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_054<tab>A-Actually, ignore that smell. Ahem! I expect you're wondering why I'm here? Well, I was just in the process of retrieving some stolen aethersand which Biggs and I need for our research, as it happens. It was, I concede, perhaps a touch foolish─and very nearly fatal─but I <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> succeed in snatching the stuff before my bodyguard ran away and several dozen bandits came piling after me with knives and axes and what looked very much like a plank with a rusty nail in it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_054何はともあれ助かったッス……。
オイラ、開発に使う「」を探しにきたッス。
危険な冒険だったけど、目的のブツは手に入れたッス！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_055<tab>A-Anyway, the important thing is that the stolen aethersand is right here in my po─ In my─ Oh. Oh dear. It must have fallen out when I was, um...taking evasive maneuvers. It seems I won't be leaving this infernal place for a while yet...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_055……あれ？　「」がないッス？
た、大変ッス、逃げてる途中で落としたッス！
探しに行かないと……！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_056<tab>...You'll find the aethersand in my stead?
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_056<tab>行ってくれるッス…………？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_057<tab>Oh, thank the gods! You're a true friend, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I hope the search doesn't prove too troublesome─the bandits don't seem to care much for visitors...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_057フッフー！　持つべきものは仲間ッス……！
「」は、この敷地内に落ちてるはずッス。
よろしく頼んだッス！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_058<tab>The aethersand must have slipped out of my pocket while I was busy evading the bandits. I'm sure it's somewhere around here...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_058逃げてる途中に「」を落としちゃったッス……。
アマジナ霊銀山跡の中に落ちてるはずッス。
よろしく頼んだッス！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Have you had any luck locating the aethersand?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_060「」はどうなったッス！？
無事に見つけ出せたッス！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_061<tab>Yes, that's it! I must return to the workshop at once and tell Biggs the wonderful news!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_061フッフー！　確かに「」ッス！
さっそく持って帰って、ビッグスにも見せてやるッス。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_062<tab>What's that? You're also on a mission to collect aethersand? And you're working with the chief? A “treasure trove of Allagan knowledge,” you say? ...I see.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_062……え？　そっちも「」を探しにきたッス？
親方と一緒に、古代アラグ文明の研究を……ふむふむ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_063<tab>Then you should really be the one to have this. Biggs and I are far from exhausting all possible avenues of airship innovation, but it sounds as if your problem can't be solved by any other means.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_063そういうことなら、この「霊砂」は持っていくといいッス。
飛空艇の開発には無限の可能性があるけど、
遺跡の調査にはこれが必要ッス！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_064<tab>This expedition of yours sounds jolly interesting, I must say... I'm half-inclined to join you. In fact─I think I will! Any venture worth the chief's time must be worth a look!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_064代わりに、オイラも調査に協力させてもらうッス。
社員をおいてひとりで調査なんて、親方は水臭いッス～！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_065<tab>Right! I'm more than ready to leave this awful place behind! And you should return to Mor Dhona with that aethersand before there are any more, um...little mishaps. Be sure to keep a close eye on your pockets, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_WEDGE_000_065じゃあ、そろそろここから脱出ッス。
先にモードゥナに戻って、「霊砂」を納めてほしいッス！
なんだか勇気が出たし、オイラも全速力で逃げきるッス！

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_070<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you have returned. I take from your presence that you were successful in procuring us some aethersand. Tell me, which variety did you find?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_070「霊砂」は調達できたか？
まずは1、2種類だけでも、確保したいところだが……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_071<tab>...I see! Two varieties. Well, that is two more than could reasonably be expected─and two less than I had hoped you would say. Forgive my flippancy. You have done well, truly. If all goes to plan, we need no longer fear death by fire or earth.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_071おお、「」と「」か！
恩に着るぞ、)) (( )) 03 /var>。
君の協力を得てから、調査はますます軌道に乗った。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_072<tab>Master Garlond─if you would be so kind as to prepare the relevant crystals.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_072シド、さっそくクリスタルの成形を始めてくれ。
一刻も早く、防衛機構を破る「牙」を作り出そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_073<tab>I shall set to work immediately. Truth be told, I've been looking forward to this. One does not encounter materials like these every day.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_073ああ、任された。
こいつが揃えた素材に、俺も全力をかけて応えよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_074<tab>Speaking of which, how in the seven hells did you find them? Mistake me not, old friend─I know only too well how capable you are, but aethersand isn't something you simply find gathering dust at the back of a merchant's rare gem cabinet.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_074それにしても、よく「霊砂」を見つけてこられたな。
お前の仕事は疑っちゃいないが、
正直、もう少しくらいは手を焼くかと思ったぞ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_075<tab>...You had help from Biggs and Wedge?
target: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_075<tab>……ビッグスとウェッジが？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_076<tab>Hmph! Trust them to design a revolutionary new engine the moment I turn my back. How's a genius meant to rest on his laurels when his employees are so damnably <var 1A 02 /var>inventive<var 1A 01 /var>, eh? And now they're determined to join us, are they? Typical!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_076そうか……まったく、うちの社員は向上心が高くて困る。
会長もおちおち踏んぞり返ってられないぜ、なぁ？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_077<tab>I jest, of course. It will be good to have them around. Still, as a matter of professional pride, let's endeavor to procure the two remaining varieties of aethersand before they arrive, shall we? Tell me, Rammbroes─have we any information on where the water- and wind-aspected types might be hiding?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_077よし、俺たちも前進あるのみだ。
あいつらが合流する前に、残りの「霊砂」を集めよう。
……在り処はわかっていないのか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_078<tab>Naught as of yet, but...I have made certain arrangements. We shall soon see if my efforts have borne fruit.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_078残念ながら……だが、手は打ってある。
そろそろ成果が届いてもいい頃なのだが……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_079<tab>Forgive me for observing, but you seem less than enthusiastic about that prospect. If there's a complication, I'd rather we discuss it now than risk jeopardizing the expedition.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_CID_000_079……それにしては浮かない顔だな。
しっかりしてくれよ、責任者。
ワケアリなら、手遅れになる前に相談してくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_080<tab><sigh> Mayhap an explanation is in order. But first, let us savor the preliminary victory that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has won for our cause, if only for a moment.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSD202_01200_RAMMBROES_000_080ああ……そうさせてもらおう。
だが、ひとまずは2つの「霊砂」の入手を労おうじゃないか。
)) (( )) 03 /var>に、多大なる感謝を。
